HomePage.description: This playground was created with the intention of having a tool for beginners to better learn HTML and CSS, and to help them understand how to nest elements in the DOM.

HomePage.sidebarIdea: This playground was created with the intention of having a tool for beginners to better learn HTML nesting and the structure of the DOM. You can drag and drop elements to the DOM and see how they nest.
HomePage.sidebarErrors: In case you try to nest an element inside another element that doesn't allow it, the playground will show you an error message. You will also get an error message if you exceed the nesting limit for that particular element.
